name: Karen Rands

jv_history.source_quote: more about how Karen brings all this knowledge gained from the hundreds of investors, venture capitalists, ... investors visit https://www.rfr.bz/l71a486 and you can schedule an appointment with her t

what_you_do: Karen Rands is disrupting the status quo of investing and championing the power of democratized wealth creation—inspiring a movement where anyone can invest in entrepreneurs, build wealth, and create lasting impact.
who_you_serve: Karen serves everyday investors, entrepreneurs, and industry experts.
offering: Karen will share the content created in your time together with her social media following on Facebook, Instagram, Youtube, TikTok and Linkedin.
social_proof: Karen is a best-selling author, top podcast host, and industry expert in crowdfunding, angel investing, economic empowerment, and funding innovation.
signature_programs: Inside Secrets to Crowdfund Investing, Inside Secrets to Angel Funding
business_focus: Expanding awareness of angel and crowdfund investing, equipping everyday people to fund innovation, fuel small business growth, and build wealth for all.
service_provided: author, podcast host, speaker, educator, mentor, advisor
